好老實講，我未見過香港會請一個full time SEO manager. 通你in DM 個JD會自動幫你加埋，實際上我肯定好多港女唔知係乜，我見好港女一年agency experience 就跳返入in house 做digital marketing executive。

其實你做緊SEM , SEO d term 對黎講應該唔乜生。
KPI:
SERP
backlinks
Number ofIndexed page
Natural Search Visits

而你要做既野就係

Improve SERP
Increase backlinks (講緊Social or referral domains)
XML sitemap, site structure (for page indexing )
Micro data (唔係meta data) 去improve natural search experience

有front end experience 基本上一日已經上到手。

Between, 我知有好多人會argues "Content is the king " 有great content 自然SERP 會高，我認同，但有great content 既site 都好多，要係first page 出現仲要出現到有好既natural search experience 就係The Art of SEO.
d客係唔係都問點解我個網唔係第一位

原來咁多客會問唔係第一頁架咩？
講緊organic定 paid result, 如果係Paid, brand keywords 去唔到top position 真係要諗下點解

Seo - 自己個網做得好唔好 入面又有好多野搞包括：
Indexing - google console
Structured Site links - site map.xml/robots.txt
Meta tags - descriptions /open graph
Video - YouTube search rankings
Mobile ranking - responsive website/ mobile site management
Multi countries - languages/ locations setting

雖然content is king, 但入面有好多野要識HTML code 先會做得好。現時Wordpress 底做既網站都好seo friendly. 自己試多d, 再用google search console 睇返organic 有咩keywords入。再慢慢opt.

Facebook 方面見到有巴打做content 跑engagement/likes 都只係其中一樣野，有心要玩Facebook 應該係要了解佢個systems /business manager/ ads manager/ 唔同ads formats

例如佢個system, 就算你唔係出ads (boost post), 你都可以做audience targeting. 如果target 得岩，咁你organic d engagement 就會升，多左shares 又再幫到更多reach. 因為現在Facebook 會limit organic reach. 官方講法 係想users 睇到咁岩佢地的content. 所以有咁的新setting. 好似都冇咩人知.....

Business managers 都係玩熟d assets （page/ad account / ig account / people/ partner) 點加 點改

Ads manager 就多野玩啦...如點做ads targeting / 點睇audience pool/ retargeting / conversion pixel 等等等等

Ads format 就 photo/video/multi image /event /offers/lead forms 等等等
